entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the one who stuck a device to her office door to spy on people. ("Umbridge had stuck it to her oﬃce door, to spy on people.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who wanted a place enclosed and undercover. ("In the woods where they held the Quidditch World Cup," said Hermione. "I wanted somewhere enclosed, undercover, and this was —")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is injured and feeling lousy. ("How d’you feel?" Hermione whispered. "Lousy," croaked Ron, wincing as he felt his injured arm.)

entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: The Quidditch World Cup is mentioned as the event that was held in the woods. ("In the woods where they held the Quidditch World Cup,")

relationships.description: Umbridge is spying on people. ("Umbridge had stuck it to her oﬃce door, to spy on people.")
Hermione is related to the Quidditch World Cup as it was held in the woods where they are currently located. ("In the woods where they held the Quidditch World Cup,")
Ron is injured and Hermione is mentioned as being present. ("How d’you feel?" Hermione whispered. "Lousy," croaked Ron, wincing as he felt his injured arm.)
